lines.line: Some friendships are built to last forever.
Others fade away with time, leaving only memories.
The day my best friend left for college, I watched from our favorite window.
The house feels different now, emptier somehow.
I still play with the toys we once shared.
Sometimes I think I hear them coming back.
But the footsteps are never theirs.
I wonder if they miss me as much as I miss them.

parsed_script.full_script: Some friendships are built to last forever.  Others fade away with time, leaving only memories.  The day my best friend left for college, I watched from our favorite window.  The house feels different now, emptier somehow.  I still play with the toys we once shared.  Sometimes I think I hear them coming back.  But the footsteps are never theirs.  I wonder if they miss me as much as I miss them.
